description.zh-cn: 西汉音乐家、外戚。他是汉武帝宠妃李夫人的哥哥，贰师将军李广利的弟弟。因犯律受腐刑，后因其妹受宠而得势，官至协律都尉。李夫人去世后失宠，最终与弟弟李季一同被处决灭族。
description.en: A musician and imperial relative by marriage during the Western Han dynasty. He was the brother of Empress Li, a favorite consort of Emperor Wu of Han, and the brother of General Li Guangli. He was castrated for committing a crime but later rose to power as the Commander of Music due to his sister's favor. After Empress Li's death, he fell from grace and was eventually executed along with his younger brother Li Ji and their clan.

description.zh-cn: 西汉第七位皇帝。因宠幸李夫人而提拔其兄李延年、李广利，后又因李夫人去世及李广利投降而将李氏家族诛灭。
description.en: The seventh emperor of the Western Han dynasty. He favored Empress Li and promoted her brothers Li Yannian and Li Guangli. He later had the Li clan exterminated following Empress Li's death and Li Guangli's surrender.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝的宠妃，李延年与李广利的妹妹。她的受宠使李氏家族兴盛，她的去世也成为家族衰落的开端。
description.en: A favorite consort of Emperor Wu of Han, and the sister of Li Yannian and Li Guangli. Her favor brought prosperity to the Li family, and her death marked the beginning of their decline.

description.zh-cn: 西汉将领，李延年与李夫人的兄弟。官至贰师将军，曾远征大宛，后在与匈奴作战时投降，导致其家族被灭。
description.en: A general of the Western Han dynasty, brother of Li Yannian and Empress Li. He held the title of 'General of Ershi' and led an expedition against Dayuan. He later surrendered to the Xiongnu during a battle, which led to the extermination of his clan.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代，由刘邦建立。李延年及其家族在此期间经历了兴衰。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history founded by Liu Bang. The Li family, including Li Yannian, experienced their rise and fall during this period.

en: Princess Pingyang (daughter of Emperor Jing of Han)

description.zh-cn: 汉景帝之女，汉武帝的姐姐。她向汉武帝举荐了李延年的妹妹，即后来的李夫人。
description.en: Daughter of Emperor Jing of Han and elder sister of Emperor Wu of Han. She recommended Li Yannian's sister, the future Empress Li, to Emperor Wu.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的一种酷刑，指对男子进行阉割。李延年曾受此刑。
description.en: A form of corporal punishment in ancient China involving the castration of a male. Li Yannian was subjected to this punishment.

description.zh-cn: 李延年的弟弟。在李夫人去世、李家失宠后，与李延年一同因罪被灭族。
description.en: Younger brother of Li Yannian. After the death of Empress Li and the Li family's fall from favor, he was executed along with Li Yannian and their clan.

description.zh-cn: 位于现今中亚费尔干纳盆地的古代国家，汉武帝曾派李广利率军远征。
description.en: An ancient state in the Fergana Valley in Central Asia, which Emperor Wu of Han dispatched Li Guangli to conquer.

description.zh-cn: 古代活跃于欧亚草原的游牧民族政权，与西汉长期发生战争。李广利最终投降于此。
description.en: A confederation of nomadic peoples who inhabited the eastern Eurasian Steppe and were in prolonged conflict with the Western Han. Li Guangli eventually surrendered to them.

description.zh-cn: 李延年是孝武皇后（李夫人）的哥哥。
description.en: Li Yannian was the elder brother of Empress Li (Lady Li).

description.zh-cn: 李延年是李广利的哥哥。
description.en: Li Yannian was the elder brother of Li Guangli.

description.zh-cn: 李延年是李季的兄长。
description.en: Li Yannian was the elder brother of Li Ji.

description.zh-cn: 孝武皇后（李夫人）是汉武帝的宠妃。
description.en: Empress Li (Lady Li) was a favorite consort of Emperor Wu of Han.

description.zh-cn: 平阳公主向汉武帝推荐了李延年的妹妹，使其入宫成为李夫人。
description.en: Princess Pingyang recommended Li Yannian's sister to Emperor Wu, leading to her becoming Lady Li in the palace.

description.zh-cn: 因其妹李夫人受汉武帝宠幸，李延年得以获封协律都尉等职，备受荣宠。
description.en: Due to his sister Lady Li's favor with Emperor Wu, Li Yannian was appointed as the Commander of Music and enjoyed great honor.

description.zh-cn: 李夫人去世后，李家失宠，汉武帝最终将李延年与其弟李季处决并灭其族。
description.en: After Empress Li's death, the Li family fell from favor. Emperor Wu eventually had Li Yannian and his brother Li Ji executed and their clan exterminated.

description.zh-cn: 与兄李延年一同因罪被汉武帝灭族。
description.en: Was executed along with his brother Li Yannian by order of Emperor Wu.

description.zh-cn: 因李广利投降匈奴，汉武帝下令将其宗族诛灭。
description.en: Because Li Guangli surrendered to the Xiongnu, Emperor Wu ordered the extermination of his clan.

description.zh-cn: 李延年为西汉官员，负责管理皇宫乐器。
description.en: Li Yannian was an official in the Western Han, responsible for managing the musical instruments of the imperial palace.

description.zh-cn: 李广利为西汉贰师将军，后于征和三年（前90年）投降匈奴。
description.en: Li Guangli was the General of Ershi for the Western Han until he surrendered to the Xiongnu in 90 BCE.

description.zh-cn: 作为贰师将军奉命征伐大宛。
description.en: As the General of Ershi, he was ordered to lead a military campaign against Dayuan.

description.zh-cn: 征和三年（前90年），李广利兵败后投降匈奴。
description.en: In 90 BCE, Li Guangli surrendered to the Xiongnu after being defeated in battle.

description.zh-cn: 李延年曾因犯法而遭受腐刑。
description.en: Li Yannian was subjected to castration as punishment for a crime.
